data.sampled: I do not have personal knowledge on your card or bank details. We do have information listed that you can refer to. If you notice a strange withdrawal in your statement, please contact your bank immediately to report the transaction. Your bank will investigate the matter and take necessary action to resolve any errors or fraudulent activities. You can also check if there are any online or mobile banking services available that allow you to dispute the transaction directly. Additionally, you can keep your card or payment details safe by being vigilant with your online or physical transactions and not sharing your personal information with others.
